headline: Thread Bank Selects Finxact from Fiserv to Power Embedded Banking Strategies, Serving as a Model for Community Banks
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., August 26, 2025--Thread Bank ("Thread" or the "Bank") today announced that it has selected Finxact from Fiserv, Inc. (NYSE: FI), the cloud-native, real-time banking core that offers enhanced access to data, as the Bank’s core banking platform. The Finxact core will allow Thread to further execute on its strategy to deliver modern, compliant, and scalable embedded and core banking solutions, creating value for partners and providing an innovation roadmap for fellow community ban

The Finxact core will allow Thread to further execute on its strategy to deliver modern, compliant, and scalable embedded and core banking solutions, creating value for partners and providing an innovation roadmap for fellow community ban

headline: Here’s Why Fiserv (FI) Traded Down in Q2
summary: Baron Funds, an investment management company, released its “Baron FinTech Fund” second quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the second quarter, the fund returned 9.26% (Institutional Shares) compared to a 13.82% return for the FactSet Global FinTech Index (Benchmark). Since its inception, the fund has appreciated at […]
